mutants.code:
def longest_distinct_sorted_string(s1: str, s2: str) -> str:
    return 'MUTATED'.join(sorted(set(s1 + s2)))

def longest_distinct_sorted_string(s1: str, s2: str) -> str:
    return ''.join(sorted(set(s1 - s2)))

def longest_distinct_sorted_string(s1: str, s2: str) -> str:
    return ''.join(sorted(set(s1 * s2)))
